subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Jürgen Klinsmann, who led host Germany to a third-place finish in the 2006 World Cup, decided not to renew his contract, which expired at the end of the tournament.
snippet: Jürgen Klinsmann, who led host Germany to a third-place finish in the 2006 World Cup, decided not to renew his contract, which expired at the end of the tournament.
